name: Windows 8 / Outlook Style for Gmail
description:
Windows 8 / Outlook style for Gmail.

Minimalist, Windows 8-like appearance for Gmail.
For proper display, the Segoe UI or Open Sans font family is required.

Last updated: 8th Feb 2013

- Fix visibility problems
- Fix minor display errors
- Change icons in order to avoid using Icomoon font family - now, it is not needed
